long_description: Inspired by boat shoes, the Sanuk Abbey Shoes look great on casual outings and are sure to keep your feet happy with their lightweight, cushioned construction. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. EVA midsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soft EVA footbeds feature AEGIS(R) antimicrobial additive to help deter odors. All-synthetic construction makes the Sanuk Abbey Shoes vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Inspired by boat shoes, the Sanuk Abbey Shoes look great on casual outings and are sure to keep your feet happy with their lightweight, cushioned construction.
